title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A revolutionary guide to building better habits and breaking bad ones. Discover practical strategies to transform your life, one small habit at a time.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
description: A no-nonsense guide to focusing on what truly matters in life, delivered with humor and brutal honesty. Learn to embrace limitations and find true happiness.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: Explore the fascinating history of humankind, from the Stone Age to the modern era. A thought-provoking journey through science, culture, and evolution.

title: Educated: A Memoir
author: Tara Westover
description: An inspiring memoir about the transformative power of education. Follow Tara's journey from a strict and abusive upbringing to earning a PhD from Cambridge.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A timeless tale of self-discovery and following one's dreams. Join Santiago on a journey through deserts, challenges, and the pursuit of a great treasure.
